about_the_game:
WARNING: This video game may trigger an attack of photosensitive epilepsy in people who are susceptible to this disease. A reasonable restriction of the gaming audience is recommended.

Mental Harm is a first-person psychological horror game in the walking simulator genre.



The main character named Sasha is going to visit the old garden of grandparents. Neighbors have long complained that strange sounds are being made from there. You, armed with only one flashlight, go to investigate this mysterious place. The secrets of this place create something that boggles the imagination. What is going on there?

Game Features:
- The main genre of the game is "Walking Simulator";
- 3D graphics close to realism;
- First-person view;
